row.process:
! insert these lines in your script to determine if an error occurred ! variables ! &KISS_TEMPLATE# ! &OUTIL_VCENTER# ! ! referentiel VARA.TECHNICAL.VCENTER ! :SET &MY_USER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.VCENTER, "USER") :SET &MY_PASSWORD#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.VCENTER, "PASSWORD") :SET &MY_VCENTER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.VCENTER, "VCENTER") :SET &MY_DATACENTER#=GET_VAR(VARA.TECHNICAL.VCENTER, "DATACENTER") :PSET &TEMPLATE_OS#="UNIX" :DEFINE &MY_RC#,string :BEGIN_EXT_INT POWERSHELL write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" get-executionpolicy write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" write-host "Connect-VIServer -Server &MY_VCENTER# -Protocol http -User '&MY_USER#' -Password '&MY_PASSWORD#'" write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" write-host "Get-Template -Name &KISS_TEMPLATE# -Location &MY_DATACENTER#" !$template = Get-Template -Name &KISS_TEMPLATE# -Location &MY_DATACENTER# | where { validateFolderPath '&MY_DATACENTER#' $_.FolderId } !if($template.count -ne 1) { ! throw "Templates retrieved. Expected 1, Found $($template.count)" ! :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","KO" !}
write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" $RC=$? if ($RC) { :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","OK" echo $RC } else { :REGISTER_VARIABLE "MY_RC#","KO" echo $RC } write-host "* * * * * * * * * *" :END_EXT_INT POWERSHELL

row.post_process: :IF &MY_RC# = "KO" : PRINT KO: TEMPLATE INEXISTANT &KISS_TEMPLATE# : PRINT DEBUG &EXIT_KISS_KO# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_KO#="&EXIT_KISS_KO#,TEMPLATE INEXISTANT &KISS_TEMPLATE#" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT = "TEMPLATE INEXISTANT &KISS_TEMPLATE#" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE = 10 :ELSE : PRINT OK: TEMPLATE EXISTE &KISS_TEMPLATE# : PSET &EXIT_KISS_OK#="&EXIT_KISS_OK#,TEMPLATE EXISTE &KISS_TEMPLATE#" : SET &RET# = STR_MATCH(&KISS_TEMPLATE#, "*WIN*") : PRINT TEST WINDOWS ou UNIX: &RET# : IF &RET# = "Y" : PSET &TEMPLATE_OS#="WINDOWS" : PUBLISH &TEMPLATE_OS#,TEMPLATE_OS#,"TOP" !: PUBLISH &TEMPLATE_OS#,TEMPLATE_OS#,"WORKFLOW" : ELSE : PSET &TEMPLATE_OS#="UNIX" : PUBLISH &TEMPLATE_OS#,TEMPLATE_OS#,"TOP" !: PUBLISH &TEMPLATE_OS#,TEMPLATE_OS#,"WORKFLOW" : ENDIF :ENDIF
